cluster_relations.rel_desc: The butterfly in the egg stage develops into a caterpillar (larval stage) when the egg hatches.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an earlier biological life stage or form naturally develops or transitions into a subsequent life stage of the same organism.

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: after a few days or weeks
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: StageOrder: egg stage precedes larval (caterpillar) stage

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The caterpillar prepares to transition into the pupa stage as the next life stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an organism in one defined life stage naturally develops into and is replaced by the next defined life stage in its life cycle.

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: after caterpillar has grown and stopped eating

remarks: Relation created to encode the developmental progression from caterpillar to pupa.
Relation created to encode the developmental progression from caterpillar to pupa.
Relation created to encode the developmental progression from caterpillar to pupa.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The egg stage is followed by and develops into the larval (caterpillar) stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an earlier biological life stage or form naturally develops or transitions into a subsequent life stage of the same organism.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The larval (caterpillar) stage precedes and transforms into the pupa stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an earlier biological life stage or form naturally develops or transitions into a subsequent life stage of the same organism.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The pupa stage transitions into the adult butterfly life stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an organism in one defined life stage naturally develops into and is replaced by the next defined life stage in its life cycle.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an earlier biological life stage or form naturally develops or transitions into a subsequent life stage of the same organism.
args.justification: All five relations encode the same semantics: one butterfly life stage naturally transitioning into the next. Three instances already use the canonical_rel_name 'develops_into' with a consistent description and class. Two instances use a slightly different canonical_rel_name 'develops_into_next_life_stage' but with the same meaning and same rel_cls/group. Normalizing these two to 'develops_into' with the shared description makes the predicate schema consistent and reusable across all life stage transitions.
args.remark: Normalized predicate naming for life-stage transitions within the butterfly life cycle cluster.
